condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Behaviour and social change of the target communities on key priorities increased through Communication for Development

description.narrative: Estimated 7.9 million people reached through social mobilisation with religious leaders, community theatre and media coverage. ECD evaluation showed: significant declines in diarrhoea prevalence from 29% at baseline to 16% at endline; and 20% less parents thinking physical punishment is necessary in the intervention site than in the control site | Status:Met | As-of Date:03/10/2018

title.narrative: # of target population reached with key behaviour change messages to prevent stunting

actual.value: 2018:On track. Assessment report of the 1,000 days' campaign found 69% reach, or estimated 7.9 million people (achieved).

title.narrative: % of children 24-35 months old exposed to any violent discipline in the 10 ECD intervention sites

actual.value: 2018:The percentage of older children exposed to any violent discipline at end line was 91.4% in the control site and 84.7% in the intervention site where ECD centre operated for over a year. (not achieved). However, proportion of parents who think physical punishment is necessary is 20% less in the inte
